data.title: Dodge Center News, Weather, Safety, Sports
data.meta_description: NewsBreak provides latest and breaking Dodge Center, MN local news, weather forecast, crime and safety reports, traffic updates, event notices, sports, entertainment, local life and other items of interest in the community and nearby towns.
data.text:
Mayo Clinic, Olmsted Medical Center, County Public Health Services, and school districts are teaming up to offer vaccinations as we head into the new school year.

Relay for Life raises over $80,000 at Dodge County Stroll. Friday night’s Dodge County Stroll — Relay for Life at the fairgrounds in Kasson raised over $80,000 for cancer research and patient care programs. The event kicked off with the survivor’s reception at 4:30 followed by an opening...

DULUTH, Minn.- The Duluth Huskies were unable to pull off the sweep on Thursday, falling to the Waterloo Bucks 11 to 8. With the loss and Thunder Bay defeating Eau Claire, Duluth remains tied for first with Eau Claire in the Great Plains East Division. The Huskies will begin their...

(ABC 6 News) — Fire crews in Rochester responded to a fire that damaged a garage on Thursday afternoon. Firefighters were called to the 2100 block of 49th Lane NW just after 12:30 PM. The fire was quickly put out, and the exterior siding sustained minor damage. No injuries were reported.

KIMT News Three's Saral Khare shares how the building is working to address an important community issue. New Rochester housing complex will offer affordable rents. Velair Property Management will be offering more affordable housing in Rochester as they're building Vallyhigh Flats ll.

(ABC 6 News) — This weekend, city leaders in Rochester are hoping to combat racism with an anti-hate rally on Sunday. The Rochester branch of the NAACP will be hosting the rally. Recently, the home of Rep. Kim Hicks as well as a synagogue were vandalized, thus prompting the...

Waste Management is investing in lower emissions in the Rochester area. Waste Management held a ribbon cutting for $20 million improvements to its hauling station on Thursday Aug. 8 as part of a several decades long effort to lower its toxic emissions.

Rochester, MN (KROC-AM News) - A Rochester woman was injured in a crash that disrupted traffic on Highway 52 just before the lunch hour today. The State Patrol says 44-year-old Heidi Bredeson was driving south when her vehicle left Highway 52 and went into the right ditch before striking a light pole. Her car then veered back onto the roadway and crashed into the median wall.

Researchers at the Mayo Clinic believe AI is key to enabling earlier and faster diagnoses. By integrating AI with EEG tests, the Mayo Clinic Neurology AI Program team in Rochester, Minnesota, can identify specific types of dementia sooner than traditional human analysis. According to a hospital press release, EEGs could...

(ABC 6 News) — Valleyhigh Flats II in Rochester has announced that it has set its opening date for the new its new affordable housing community. This will be Velair Property Management’s 12th building in Rochester as the organization continues its efforts to offer affordable housing throughout Minnesota.

Rochester, MN (KROC-AM News)- An Olmsted County Judge has handed down the first of two sentences in a case involving a pair of shootings and an attempted robbery in Rochester. Both men charged in the case have entered guilty pleas. Rochester Police arrested the suspects several days after taking reports of the shooting and attempted robbery last fall.

A Rochester man has been indicted on firearm and drug trafficking charges, announced U.S. Attorney Andrew M. Luger. According to court documents, on or about April 28, 2024, Liban Abdikadar Abdullahi, 29, knowingly possessed a 9mm Glock model 43 semiautomatic pistol. Abdullahi also possessed with the intent to distribute fentanyl and carried the Glock pistol to further his drug trafficking crime.

ROCHESTER, Minn. – A prison sentence has been handed down over gunfire at the Olmsted County Fairgrounds. Kelvin Armando Figueroa-Millan, 19 of Owatonna, pleaded guilty to second-degree assault with a dangerous weapon and has been ordered to spend three years in prison, with credit for four days already served. Figueroa-Millan must also pay $1,532.44 in restitution.

(ABC 6 News) – A dementia patient died because a Rochester facility failed to address their increased choking risk, according to the Minnesota Department of Health. The MDH investigated Cascade Creek, an assisted living facility with dementia care, in July of this year, according to a report released Aug. 6.

(ABC 6 News) — Byron School District budget shortfalls nearly led to the district’s school resource officer position being cut, but the city and Olmsted County Sheriff’s Office were able to create a plan to save the position. The City of Byron and OCSO will split the...

I grew up in Minnesota and used to work for the state GOP. I’m a bit surprised to see Vice President Kamala Harris choose Gov. Tim Walz (D-MN) as her running mate. He boasts a progressive record, and a poor one, at that. Plus, she didn’t really need Minnesota’s electoral votes — she had already […]

This week, Kamala Harris picked Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz as her running mate, kicking off an absolute frenzy of journalists using the word "folksy." Walz and Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance are both fonts of memes and, as it turns out, quiz questions … enjoy!

Rochester, MN (KROC-AM News)- A new specialized law enforcement vehicle has hit the road in southeast Minnesota. The receiving of the vehicle comes as Minnesota has seen an increase in traffic deaths on the state’s roads. There have been 216 fatalities through July 11 in 2024, which is up...
